Lori Kemp
=========

[Commissioners](https://www.burkburnett.org/Directory.aspx?DID=17)
Title: Mayor
[Email Lori Kemp](mailto:mayor@burkburnett.org)

Lori Kemp is honored to serve as the Mayor of Burkburnett, the community she has proudly called home  almost her entire life. Lori comes from a family of lifelong residents who have been actively involved in shaping and supporting the city for generations. Her commitment to Burkburnett is both professional and personal—her two children attend school here, and she is dedicated to ensuring the community remains a thriving and welcoming place for all families.

In addition to her role as Mayor, Lori is an accomplished business leader with over 20 years of executive experience in the post-acute healthcare industry, currently serving as Vice President for a national home care franchise organization, CareBuilders at Home.

For Lori, Burkburnett is more than just a place to live—it’s home. Her vision is rooted in preserving the city’s small-town values while driving progress that benefits current and future generations.
